mapper.select: SELECT purchase_id,kind,number,remain_number,grade,createtime,createuser,status,parentid,type,price,supply_number, id,kind1,num,grade1,createtime1,parentid1,status1 from (SELECT purchase_id,kind,number,remain_number,grade,createtime,createuser,status,parentid,type,price,supply_number from purchase_info WHERE createtime like '%${date1}%' and status ='1' and type='0')as cg LEFT JOIN (SELECT id,kind as kind1,num,grade as grade1,createtime as createtime1,parentid as parentid1,status as status1 from require_info WHERE createtime like '%${date2}%') as xq on cg.kind = xq.kind1 and cg.grade = xq.grade1 UNION SELECT purchase_id,kind,number,remain_number,grade,createtime,createuser,status,parentid,type,price,supply_number, id,kind1,num,grade1,createtime1,parentid1,status1 from (SELECT purchase_id,kind,number,remain_number,grade,createtime,createuser,status,parentid,type,price,supply_number from purchase_info WHERE createtime like '%${date1}%' and status ='1' and type='0')as cg RIGHT JOIN (SELECT id,kind as kind1,num,grade as grade1,createtime as createtime1,parentid as parentid1,status as status1 from require_info WHERE createtime like '%${date2}%') as xq on cg.kind = xq.kind1 and cg.grade = xq.grade1
